'''Myriad of Lights''' is a soundtrack from the EP album ''[[Fleeting Colors in Flight (Album)|Fleeting Colors in Flight]]''.

The soundtrack was featured in an animated cutscene from the [[Event Quest]] [[Fleeting Colors in Flight]]: Part III - "[[The Stars Inscribe the Year's Wishes]]."

==Trivia==
* The main theme of the ''Fleeting Colors in Flight'' event can be heard in the opening of Shanghai's 2019 city image film ''上海·恒新之城 Shanghai·Ever-Renewing City''.<ref>Weibo: [https://weibo.com/2539961154/Ia2tn0FQS 【上海·恒新之城！全新进博会城市形象片震撼发布】]</ref>
** There are no sources to confirm that Yu-Peng Chen of [[HOYO-MiX]] composed specifically this film's soundtrack, thought it is possible since he composed the soundtrack for Shanghai's 2016 image film ''上海，创新之城 Shanghai, City of Innovation''.<ref>NetEase Cloud Music: [https://music.163.com/#/song?id=1351627948 上海，创新之城]</ref>
** In December 2020, during the Game Quality (游戏精品化) sub-forum of the China Game Industry Annual Conference<!--official name--> (中国游戏产业年会), Chen confirmed that he has been responsible for Shanghai's image films in recent years.<ref>Tencent News: [https://xw.qq.com/cmsid/20201217A0DYAK00 《原神》靠什么走出世界？音乐制作人：中西文化融合碰撞有成效]</ref>
* This soundtrack features multiple themes:
** [[Liyue (Soundtrack)|Liyue]] (second theme)
** [[Genshin Impact Main Theme]]
** [[Moon in One's Cup]]/[[Maiden's Longing]]/[[Clear Sky Over Liyue]]
** [[Peaceful Hike (Qingce Daytime)|Peaceful Hike]]/[[The Fading Stories (Qingce Night)|The Fading Stories]]
